title: Lechem Erez
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Mediterranean, Israeli, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. Chain of cafes with multiple locations. This one is in 1920s historical building. Offers a separate vegan menu at this branch of Lechem Erez. Includes vegan breakfast, salad with tofu, mushroom salad, and Jerusalem artichoke salad, sandwiches, vegan pizza. No extra charge for soy milk in coffee. A shop selling fresh breads, olives, and other foods is also on the premises.
